summary: Pierrette Dumortier, a woman of character but weak-willed and defenseless against boredom, decides one fine day to leave her husband and her bourgeois life in Switzerland to return to Paris... See full summary »
cast: Catherine Frot|Sébastien Cotterot|Barbara Schulz|Jacques Dacqmine|Christian Morin|Nathalie Lafaurie|Paul Minthe|Vania Vadim|Jean Desailly|Clément Thomas|Armelle|Aymard Du Vivier|Roger Trapp|Jean-François Balmer|Marie-Christine Barrault|Didier Bezace|Gisèle Casadesus|Odette Laure|Bernard Verley|Reinhardt Wagner|Valériane de Villeneuve|Michèle Garcia|Myriam Moszko|Sophie Forte|Clément Weill-Raynal|Jean Cortot|Marthe Philip Guiderdoni|Isabelle Giami|Hélène Roussel|Michel Tugot-Doris|Edith Perret|Hong Mai Thomas|Marion Cerquant|Ariane Rousseau|Michèle André|Sophie Mounicot|Marie Vincent|Corinne Corson|Christophe Barratier|Jean-Lou Descamps|Daniel Fernandez-Alvarez|Omar Dawson|Josette Ménard|Gérard Hernandez|Frédéric Casellas|Valérie Flan|Marie-Jo Boubarne|Mathilde Hochet|Victoria Lafaurie|André Thorent|Vanessa Bettane|François Jerosme|Charles Senard|Nathalie Larcher
title: La dilettante
